result.execSummary:
The defendant Ethan Glen Siem was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Concurrent with: Ct#2

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 12:04 Defendant Ethan Glen Siem in court.  Probation agent Sheila Drawkowski present in court. Drawkowski: def will have the amounts paid by next Friday. Court: must be paid before February 8th or he will be extended. Def agrees.
Defendant's Notice of Hearing. Return to Sender. Not Deliverable as addressed.
Probation review hearing on February 2, 2017 at 11:45 am.

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: 3:22 Defendant Ethan Glen Siem in court.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Thorie: guilty to both counts. 1 year probation. Defendant agrees. Court goes over waiver of right to Attorney and plea questionnare/waiver of rights with Def.   Constitutional rights explained to defendant.  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas guilty to Ct#1 and Ct#2; stipulates to facts in complaint.  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. Court finds and adjudicates Def guilty of Ct#1 and Ct#2. Thorie addresses. Def addresses the court. Court: S/W 1 year probation on each count, concurrent. conditions: any conditions imposed by Agent, court costs and DNA surcharge.  Appeal rights are given to the defendant.

03:52 Defendant Ethan Glen Siem in court, in custody.  VIA VIDEO CONFERENCING FROM PCJ.  William Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has copy of complaint.   Court reads charges and possible penalties.   Defendant waives reading of the complaint.   Constitutional rights explained to defendant.   Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights.  Defendant pleads not guilty to both counts. Thorie: $1000 signature bond.  Defendant has no objection.   Bond conditions read to the Defendant by the Court Commissioner.
Address: correct
DOB: correct
Phone: 507-273-3013
Defendant has not been in the armed services.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 9, 2016 at 03:15 pm.
